title: Ayurvedic Medicinal Herb Seeds
description: The name 'Ayurveda' refers to the 5000-year-old traditional Indian healing art that is being practiced in India, Nepal and Sri Lanka even today. An important pillar of this medicine is the healing herbology. Also in Europe Ayurveda is becoming increasingly well known.
